Panama Papers Putinophobia Nabs Petro Poroshenko

John Batchelor podcast april 6,2016 mp3

 Stephen F. Cohen, NYU. Princeton. EastWestAccord.com.

â€œâ€¦Ukrainian politicians wasted no time in using the revelations put forward against Poroshenko in the so-called â€œPanama Papersâ€ â€” a trove of 11.5 million documents leaked from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca â€” to announce efforts to oust Poroshenko, who adamantly denies that he did anything illegal.

â€œOleh Lyashko, a populist politician and the head of Ukraineâ€™s Radical Party, wrote onMonday that he plans to launch impeachment proceedings against Poroshenko due to his offshore holdings in the British Virgin Islands.

â€œWe demand the creation of a special temporary investigative committee in parliament that would probe the secret offshore companies and accounts of Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko,â€ Lyashko said.

â€œThe call was echoed in astatement by the pro-Western Samopomich party on Monday, who also said that they will call for the creation of a committee in parliament to investigate the allegations against Poroshenkoâ€¦.â€
